content: This setting allows you to make the Developer Tools section visible to all users except guests.

comment.text: This translation key controls the visibility setting for the "Developer Tools" section on mobile devices, allowing users to decide who can see this content. The translated text appears in a category title and is used as a subtitle for a mobile-specific settings page.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Bütün istifadəçilər üçün görünən etməyə imkan verir' is a bit awkward and doesn't fully capture the nuance of 'allows you to make...visible'. A more natural phrasing would be 'Bütün istifadəçilər üçün görünən hala gətirə bilməyə imkan verir' or 'Bütün istifadəçilər üçün görünə bilməsi üçün imkan verir'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Bütün istifadəçilər üçün görünə bilməsi üçün imkan verir.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation uses a full stop at the end of the sentence. While grammatically correct, for UI text, a period is often omitted.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Remove the full stop at the end of the sentence.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "hacer que la sección" is a slightly awkward phrasing in Spanish. It translates literally to 'make that the section,' which isn't the most natural way to express the intention. A more fluent translation would be to say 'mostrar' or 'dejar que la sección sea'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Esta configuración le permite mostrar la sección Herramientas de desarrollo para todos los usuarios excepto los invitados.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Developer Tools" is directly transliterated instead of being translated to its Armenian equivalent. While acceptable in some contexts, it might be more user-friendly to use an Armenian equivalent.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider translating 'Developer Tools' to something like 'ծրագրային գործիքների մեքենայություն' or a more colloquial equivalent depending on the target audience.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "この設定により、ゲストを除くすべてのユーザーに「開発者ツール」セクションを表示することができます。" is a bit literal and sounds unnatural in Japanese. A more natural phrasing would better convey the meaning of allowing visibility.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: この設定により、ゲスト以外のすべてのユーザーで「開発者ツール」セクションを表示できるようになります。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The use of quotation marks around "開発者ツール" feels slightly off. While technically correct, it's more common to omit them or use different styling in UI contexts.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: この設定により、ゲスト以外のすべてのユーザーで「開発者ツール」セクションを表示できるようになります。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'make the Developer Tools section visible' could be more naturally expressed in Korean. While technically correct, it's a bit stiff.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 이 설정을 사용하면 게스트를 제외한 모든 사용자에게 개발자 도구 섹션이 보이도록 설정할 수 있습니다.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "ເຮັດໃຫ້ສ່ວນເຄື່ອງມືໃຫຍ່ສໍາລັບນັກພັດທະນາ" is a literal translation that doesn't flow naturally in Lao. 'Developer Tools' is better translated as 'ເຄື່ອງມືພັດທະນາ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການកំណត់ນີ້ຊ່ວຍໃຫ້ທ່ານສາມາດເຮັດໃຫ້ສ່ວນເຄື່ອງມືພັດທະນາ (Developer Tools) ປາກົດຕົວໃຫ້ຜູ້ໃຊ້ທຸກຄົນເວັ້ນເສັ້ນຜູ້ເຂົ້າແອື້ (guests).

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'ຜູ້ເຂົ້າແອື້' is understandable, a more common and natural translation for 'guests' would be 'ຜູ້ໃຊ້ອາທິດິຕັ້ງຊົ່ວຄາວ' or simply 'ແຂກ'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ການកំណត់ນີ້ຊ່ວຍໃຫ້ທ່ານສາມາດເຮັດໃຫ້ສ່ວນເຄື່ອງມືພັດທະນາ (Developer Tools) ປາກົດຕົວໃຫ້ຜູ້ໃຊ້ທຸກຄົນເວັ້ນເສັ້ນແຂກ.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation 'Narzędzia programistyczne' is a literal translation of 'Developer Tools' and might not be the most natural way to express it in Polish. It sounds a bit technical and clunky. A more user-friendly alternative might be 'Narzędzia deweloperskie'.

The translation 'ආගන්තුකයින් හැර අනෙකුත් සියලු පරිශීලකයින්' (aganthukayin her anekunath piyasilakin) translates to 'all other users except guests'. While technically correct, it's more natural to say 'all users except guests' which would be ' සියලු පරිශීලකයින් හැර ආගන්තුකයින්' (siyalū pariyasilakin her aganthukayin).
The word order 'මෙම සැකසුම ඔබට ඉඩ සලසයි' (mema sakasumu obā iba salasai) can be slightly improved for a more natural flow. It's slightly awkward.

The term 'Алатке за програмере' is a literal translation of 'Developer Tools' which might not be the most natural phrasing in Serbian. A more common and understandable term might be 'Инструменти за програмере' or 'Средства за програмере'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider using 'Инструменти за програмере' or 'Средства за програмере' instead of 'Алатке за програмере'.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Ovo podešavanje vam omogućava" is overly formal and slightly awkward for a user-facing setting description. A more natural phrasing would improve readability.
While technically correct, "Odeljak Alatke za programere" is a bit clunky. A more common and easily understood term would be preferable. Consider using a simpler equivalent.

The phrase 'Công cụ dành cho nhà phát triển' is a literal translation of 'Developer Tools' and while understandable, a more natural Vietnamese phrasing might be 'Công cụ phát triển' or 'Bộ công cụ phát triển'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cài đặt này cho phép bạn hiển thị phần Công cụ phát triển cho tất cả người dùng, ngoại trừ khách.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While 'ngoại trừ khách' is correct, it could be slightly improved for clarity and flow. 'ngoại trừ người dùng khách' is more formal and precise.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Cài đặt này cho phép bạn hiển thị phần Công cụ phát triển cho tất cả người dùng, ngoại trừ người dùng khách.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The translation "此设置允许所有非访客用户查看开发者工具模块" is technically correct, but could be more natural and closely aligned with the English meaning. "非访客用户" is a bit formal and clunky. A better phrasing would capture the exclusion of 'guests' more smoothly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: 此设置允许除访客外的所有用户查看开发者工具模块。
